notesStmt.note: Incomplete at the beginning. Two leaves are missing after folio 183. Several leaves at the beginning and at the end are mutilated. Marginal notes.
Avraham ben Se῾id and Se῾id Da᾿ud: inscribed in the lower margin of folio 75r.

collation.p: One leaf is missing at the beginning and the first signature is at the end of folio 8. Folios 9-15 form the second quire, folios 16-23 the third, and folios 24-183 contain 16 quires of 10 leaves each. Folio 184 remains of the last quire, the rest having been cancelled.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 16th century. [Av]raham ha-Kohen ben Se῾adyah ha-Kohen: inscribed, folio 184v, with a date of 1824 [1513].
